lead_paragraph: Steve Forbes, a businessman who has been pushing for years to replace the nation's income tax with a flat tax, has endorsed Rick Perry's campaign for the presidency. The likelihood of the endorsement was flagged by The Times' Catherine Rampell and Rich Oppel last week, who noted that Mr. Forbes was advising Mr. Perry on development of a flat tax proposal. In an interview on Fox News over the weekend, Mr. Forbes praised Mr. Perry's "firm leadership" as the reason for his endorsement.Read more »

headline.main: Steve Forbes Endorses Perry for Pushing Flat Tax
